data.title: Massive paedophile ring uncovered by police in Norway after arrest of 51 men
Man without arms denied housing loan due to inability to provide fingerprints
UK to censor online videos of 'non-conventional' sex acts
China could take leadership role in Paris climate change deal if Trump pulls U.S. out

Nigerian farmers, fishermen sue Shell in UK over pollution • "Let the shareholders of Shell who are residents of the advanced world, like Britain, let them see a representative of a kingdom that is being destroyed for them to have money"
The FBI Hacked Over 8,000 Computers In 120 Countries Based on 1 Warrant
Pakistan Anti-Terrorism Court sentences five to death over burning alive Christian couple in 2014.

Solar cells can be made with tin instead of lead, scientists find - "There is now an urgent need to tackle the threat of climate change resulting from humanity's over reliance on fossil fuel, and the rapid development of new solar technologies must be part of the plan."
South Korean authorities have raided the offices of Samsung and the national pension fund as part of a corruption investigation linked to the president.
Tesla powers a whole island with solar to show off its energy chops
Brexit minister David Davis accused of 'having no idea what Brexit means' after saying UK wants to stay in single market
US navy's most expensive destroyer breaks down in Panama Canal. USS Zumwalt which cost more than $4.4bn, stuck in Panama after losing propulsion and sustaining cosmetic damage
The European Parliament called on the EU and its states to do more to counter Russian "disinformation and propaganda warfare" on Wednesday, drawing an angry response from President Vladimir Putin
Egypt unearths 7,000-year-old lost city. Archaeologists discover huts, tools and 15 huge graves dating from first dynasty period in Sohag province.
Philip Hammond has admitted that the Brexit vote’s blow to the economy would force the government to borrow £122bn more than hoped.
